title: Withdrawals
context: ยง412:10-304 Withdrawals. (a) Funds in share and deposit accounts may be withdrawn for payment to the account holder or third parties in such manner and in accordance with such procedures as are established by the board of directors. (b) Share and deposit accounts shall be subject to any withdrawal notice requirement which is imposed pursuant to the bylaws. [L 1993, c 350, pt of ยง1]
